title: `vptx64-nvidia-cuda` target triplet panics during compilation

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Context A `#![no_std]` hello world binary panics when compiling for `vptx64-nvidia-cuda` target triplet. Rustc says it is due to this target not supporting dylibs. ### Code The code to compile is a `no_std` hello world cross compiled using `cross build`. This code compiles just fine in most targets (Tier 1 + 2, I've tested 40+ other targets so far in github actions). src/main.rs ```Rust #![no_std] #![no_main] #[panic_handler] fn panic(_info: &core::panic::PanicInfo) -> ! { loop {} } #[link(name = "c")] extern "C" { fn write(fd: i32, buf: *const i8, count: usize) -> isize; } #[no_mangle] pub extern "C" fn main() -> isize { unsafe { write(1, b"Hello, World!\n" as *const u8 as *const i8, 14) }; 0 } ``` Cargo.toml ```rs [package] name = "rust-build-binary-github-actions" version = "0.1.0" edition = "2021" [profile.dev] panic = "abort" [profile.release] panic = "abort" ``` ### Meta #### Stable: ``` $ rustc --version --verbose rustc 1.56.1 (59eed8a2a 2021-11-01) binary: rustc commit-hash: 59eed8a2aac0230a8b53e89d4e99d55912ba6b35 commit-date: 2021-11-01 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.56.1 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` #### Nightly: ``` $ rustc --version --verbose rustc 1.58.0-nightly (18bc4bee9 2021-11-02) binary: rustc commit-hash: 18bc4bee9710b181b440a472635150f0d6257713 commit-date: 2021-11-02 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.58.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` #### Beta: ``` $ rustc --version --verbose rustc 1.57.0-beta.3 (708d57e28 2021-11-01) binary: rustc commit-hash: 708d57e288d051a6238ed56039ffeac158e10e84 commit-date: 2021-11-01 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.57.0-beta.3 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output Note: Error output is the same for stable, nightly and beta. ``` $ cross build --locked --release --target=nvptx64-nvidia-cuda Compiling rust-build-binary-github-actions v0.1.0 (/home/runner/work/rust-build-binary-github-actions/rust-build-binary-github-actions) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'external dylibs not supported', compiler/rustc_codegen_ssa/src/back/linker.rs:1436:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic Error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.56.1 (59eed8a2a 2021-11-01) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 -C panic=abort -C embed-bitcode=no --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `rust-build-binary-github-actions` ```
Backtrace

``` $ cross build --locked --release --target=nvptx64-nvidia-cuda Compiling rust-build-binary-github-actions v0.1.0 (/home/runner/work/rust-build-binary-github-actions/rust-build-binary-github-actions) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'external dylibs not supported', compiler/rustc_codegen_ssa/src/back/linker.rs:1436:9 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: ::link_dylib 2: rustc_codegen_ssa::back::link::add_local_native_libraries 3: rustc_codegen_ssa::back::link::link_natively 4: rustc_codegen_ssa::back::link::link_binary 5: ::link 6: rustc_interface::queries::Linker::link 7: rustc_span::with_source_map 8: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic Error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.56.1 (59eed8a2a 2021-11-01) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 -C panic=abort -C embed-bitcode=no --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `rust-build-binary-github-actions` ```
